headline.main: Life on the Edge in Rural Nepal

docs.snippet: On a steep cliff northeast of Kathmandu, one family is forced to live outside, mourning the dead and worrying that rains from the coming monsoons will create more deadly landslides....
docs.lead_paragraph: On a steep cliff northeast of Kathmandu, one family is forced to live outside, mourning the dead and worrying that rains from the coming monsoons will create more deadly landslides.

headline.main: Woman in Penis Injection Case Jailed Amid Talk of Bribes
headline.print_headline: Woman in Penis Injection Case Jailed Amid Talk of Bribes

docs.snippet: A woman accused of causing a man's death with an injection of silicone he hoped would enlarge his penis has been jailed after a judge ruled she was complicit in a scheme to bribe potential jurors....
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman accused of causing a man's death with an injection of silicone he hoped would enlarge his penis has been jailed after a judge ruled she was complicit in a scheme to bribe potential jurors.

headline.main: Southern California Man Gets Jail for Poodle Killing
headline.print_headline: Southern California Man Gets Jail for Poodle Killing

docs.snippet: A Southern California man who beat to death his miniature poodle has been sentenced to a year in jail....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Southern California man who beat to death his miniature poodle has been sentenced to a year in jail.

headline.main: Messi Is the Best Player of All Time-Bayern's Guardiola
headline.print_headline: Messi Is the Best Player of All Time-Bayern's Guardiola

docs.snippet: Barcelona's Lionel Messi is the best player ever, Bayern coach Pep Guardiola said on Tuesday after the Spanish side eliminated the Bavarians 5-3 on aggregate to reach next month's Champions League final....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona's Lionel Messi is the best player ever, Bayern coach Pep Guardiola said on Tuesday after the Spanish side eliminated the Bavarians 5-3 on aggregate to reach next month's Champions League final.

headline.main: Luis Enrique 'Suffers' on Sidelines as Barca Reach Final
headline.print_headline: Luis Enrique 'Suffers' on Sidelines as Barca Reach Final

docs.snippet: Barcelona coach Luis Enrique saw his team beat Bayern Munich 5-3 on aggregate to reach their eighth European Cup final on Tuesday, but said it had been a nerve-racking experience having to watch their stellar run from the sidelines....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona coach Luis Enrique saw his team beat Bayern Munich 5-3 on aggregate to reach their eighth European Cup final on Tuesday, but said it had been a nerve-racking experience having to watch their stellar run from the sidelines.

headline.main: Climbers Who Stomped 'SOS' in Snow Rescued From Mountain
headline.print_headline: Climbers Who Stomped 'SOS' in Snow Rescued From Mountain

docs.snippet: National Park Service officials say two climbers from Idaho who stomped out "SOS" in the snow were rescued unharmed from an Alaska mountain after triggering an avalanche....
docs.lead_paragraph: National Park Service officials say two climbers from Idaho who stomped out "SOS" in the snow were rescued unharmed from an Alaska mountain after triggering an avalanche.

headline.main: 2 From Florida Dead After Chase From Colorado to New Mexico
headline.print_headline: 2 From Florida Dead After Chase From Colorado to New Mexico

docs.snippet: A Florida man and his 14-year-old niece were found dead with gunshot wounds to the head after a wild car chase across the Southwest in which multiple shots were fired at officers, New Mexico authorities said Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Florida man and his 14-year-old niece were found dead with gunshot wounds to the head after a wild car chase across the Southwest in which multiple shots were fired at officers, New Mexico authorities said Tuesday.

headline.main: Global bond worries weigh on stocks
headline.sub: Global bond worries weigh on stocks

docs.snippet: Stocks closed lower on Tuesday after a recent run-up in global bond yields unsettled investors already concerned about rising interest rates. Bobbi Rebell reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Stocks closed lower on Tuesday after a recent run-up in global bond yields unsettled investors already concerned about rising interest rates. Bobbi Rebell reports.

headline.main: Honda's Oval Package Could Make Indy 500 Different Race
headline.print_headline: Honda's Oval Package Could Make Indy 500 Different Race

docs.snippet: Honda has been chasing Chevrolet all season. Now the gap between the two IndyCar engine manufacturers may be closing....

headline.main: Shell: Company Will Bring Drill Rigs to Seattle Terminal
headline.print_headline: Shell: Company Will Bring Drill Rigs to Seattle Terminal
